com.rmi.api

Interface IHeartBeat

  • All Superinterfaces:
    java.rmi.Remote
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    HeartBeat

    public interface IHeartBeat
extends java.rmi.Remote
    A remote method to test whether a peer is alive by send out a signal.

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void report(java.util.List<java.lang.String> fileList)
      if the peer's files are not the same as registered on index server report it.
      boolean signal(byte[] MD5_array, java.lang.String peer_service_port)
      send signal to peer.
